summary: Makes the Invisibility spell a Concentration spell.
descriptionHtml: This simple mod makes the Invisbility spell a Concentration spell. The base cost for the original is 100 points of magicka, and lasts for 30 seconds, while this version has a base cost of 5 points per second, so this consumes a little bit more magicka than the original one (because I felt like you could be invisible forever with a 3.33 points per second cost..)
author: Winded AKA FalloutGamer
